title: Although I Was Summoned as a Scapegoat, I’m Happy - Novel Updates
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Demon Lord   Demons   Female Protagonist   Love at First Sight   Oneshot   Saints
author: 高遠ユウ
description:
A magic circle wrapped a beautiful girl from my class. However, that woman made me a scapegoat and I got summoned as a Saint.

Saint-sama? Subjugate the Demon King? Stop kidding me!>
